statements: SELECT * FROM UserActivities;
SELECT user_id, activity_name FROM UserActivities WHERE activity_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT activity_name, activity_duration FROM UserActivities WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT activity_name FROM UserActivities WHERE user_id IN (100, 101) ORDER BY activity_duration ASC;
SELECT user_id, activity_date FROM UserActivities WHERE activity_duration > 60 AND activity_duration < 120 ORDER BY user_id, activity_date;
SELECT * FROM UserActivities WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY activity_date DESC, activity_duration ASC;
SELECT user_id, activity_name FROM UserActivities WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01' AND activity_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY activity_duration DESC;
SELECT activity_name, activity_date FROM UserActivities WHERE user_id = 2 AND activity_duration > 60 ORDER BY activity_duration ASC, activity_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, activity_name, activity_duration FROM UserActivities WHERE activity_name LIKE '%jogging%' ORDER BY user_id ASC, activity_duration DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM UserActivities GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_activities > 5 ORDER BY total_activities DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_activities WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT activity_type, activity_date FROM user_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Login' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_description FROM user_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Post' AND user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM game_statistics WHERE player_id = 3 AND level > 5 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_name, progress FROM game_statistics WHERE game_name = 'Chess' ORDER BY progress ASC;
SELECT user_id, activity_description, activity_date, activity_type FROM user_activities WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY activity_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_id, game_name, score, level FROM game_statistics WHERE level > 5 AND score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC, level ASC;

SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_date, activity_description FROM user_activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND activity_type IN ('login', 'logout') ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT player_id, game_name, level, progress FROM game_statistics WHERE progress BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1 ORDER BY level DESC, progress ASC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_description, activity_date FROM user_activities WHERE user_id = 123456 AND activity_type LIKE '%game%' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_name, activity_date FROM user_activities WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT activity_name, activity_date, user_id FROM user_activities WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY activity_date DESC
SELECT * FROM user_activities WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01' AND activity_date <= '2022-06-30'
SELECT user_id, activity_name FROM user_activities WHERE activity_name LIKE '%running%'
SELECT user_id, activity_name, activity_date FROM user_activities WHERE activity_name = 'Exercise' ORDER BY activity_date
SELECT user_id, activity_name, activity_date FROM user_activities WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, game_name, points, level FROM game_statistics WHERE points > 50 ORDER BY points DESC, level ASC;
SELECT user_id, goal_name, target_date, progress_percentage FROM goal_progress WHERE user_id = 2 AND target_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, activity_name FROM user_activities WHERE activity_name LIKE '%running%';
SELECT * FROM user_activities;
SELECT user_id, activity_name, activity_date FROM user_activities WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT * FROM game_statistics ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profile WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM progress_goals WHERE target_value < current_progress;
SELECT * FROM user_activities WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT activity_name, duration_minutes FROM user_activities WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, game_name, score FROM game_statistics WHERE total_playtime_minutes > 60 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT user_id, goal_name, target_value FROM progress_goals WHERE current_progress < target_value AND user_id = 3;
SELECT username, email, join_date FROM user_profile WHERE join_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM user_activities;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM user_activities WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profile WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, goal_name, progress FROM goals_progress ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT activity_type, activity_date, activity_duration FROM user_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Running' ORDER BY activity_date;
SELECT * FROM user_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Running';
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profile WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, game_id, score FROM game_statistics WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT user_id, goal_name, progress FROM goals_progress WHERE user_id = 123 AND progress < 100;
SELECT activity_type, activity_duration FROM activity_log WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
